hook.description: Check how much budget you're wasting on unused tools. It takes 3 minutes.

input.title: Choose your tools
input.description: Select everything you pay for monthly.

segment.title: Before we begin: What's your industry?
segment.description: We'll tailor the tool list to your needs so you don't waste time.

results.perfect_score_desc: Your company is free from unnecessary subscription costs.
results.your_score_desc: See how much capital is leaking from your company.
results.money_well_spent_desc: Yearly cost of tools you actively use and benefit from.
results.perfect_score_money_desc: This is the amount working for your company's growth.
results.your_score_money_desc: This is the amount disappearing from your account every year.
results.your_score_5_years_desc: This is how much you'll lose if you change nothing.
results.to_silicon_valley: To Silicon Valley giants. For nothing.
results.keep_it_up: You're not wasting resources. Keep it up!
results.paying_for_unused: You are paying for unused tools:
results.all_tools_used: All paid tools are actively used.
results.pure_loss: This is pure loss. Tools not opened for 30 days.
results.no_conflicts: No obvious conflicts detected in selected tools.
results.perfect_score_cta_desc: You have finances under control. How about your personal brand strategy? Let's check it.
results.your_score_cta_desc: Most paid apps have free, open alternatives. They are just as effective but generate no invoices and don't trade your data. I'll show you how to safely switch subscriptions for Open Source.

adobe_cc_all.name: Adobe CC (All Apps)
adobe_cc_all.conflictMessage: Do you have Canva? Adobe CC is a powerful tool, but does everyone need it?

canva_pro.name: Canva Pro
canva_pro.conflictMessage: Do you have Adobe CC? Canva might be an unnecessary expense.

ahrefs_lite.name: Ahrefs Lite
ahrefs_lite.conflictMessage: Conflict: You already have Semrush. These tools overlap.

semrush_pro.name: Semrush Pro
semrush_pro.conflictMessage: Conflict: You already have Ahrefs. These tools overlap.

m365_personal.name: Microsoft 365 Personal
m365_personal.conflictMessage: You are duplicating office ecosystems (Microsoft + Google).

m365_premium.name: Microsoft 365 Premium
m365_premium.conflictMessage: You are duplicating office ecosystems (Microsoft + Google).

google_workspace_starter.name: Google Workspace Starter
google_workspace_starter.conflictMessage: You are duplicating office ecosystems (Google + Microsoft).

google_workspace_std.name: Google Workspace Standard
google_workspace_std.conflictMessage: You are duplicating office ecosystems (Google + Microsoft).

dropbox_plus.name: Dropbox Plus
dropbox_plus.conflictMessage: You have OneDrive in the Microsoft package. Dropbox is unnecessary.

wetransfer_pro.name: WeTransfer Pro
wetransfer_pro.conflictMessage: You have Google Drive. WeTransfer Pro is unnecessary.

zoom_pro.name: Zoom Pro
zoom_pro.conflictMessage: You have Teams in the Microsoft package. Zoom is unnecessary.

slack_pro.name: Slack Pro
slack_pro.conflictMessage: You have Teams in the Microsoft package. Slack might be unnecessary.

trello_std.name: Trello Standard
trello_std.conflictMessage: Monday has Trello features. You are duplicating tools.

spotify_prem.name: Spotify Premium
spotify_prem.conflictMessage: Conflict: YouTube Premium includes YouTube Music. You are paying double for music.

gitlab_premium.name: GitLab Premium
gitlab_premium.conflictMessage: You have GitHub. GitLab might be redundant.

hubspot_sales.name: HubSpot Sales Hub
hubspot_sales.conflictMessage: Conflict: You have Salesforce. These CRM tools overlap.

salesforce_essentials.name: Salesforce Essentials
salesforce_essentials.conflictMessage: Conflict: You have HubSpot. These CRM tools overlap.
